game.name: MatchBuzz
game.shortDescription: MatchBuzz automatically detects when your competitive match starts in Overwatch 2 or Apex Legends and sends instant notifications to Discord or Windows. Never miss a match while grabbing a drink or taking a quick break.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MatchBuzz automatically detects when your competitive match starts in Overwatch 2 or Apex Legends and sends instant notifications to Discord or Windows. Never miss a match while grabbing a drink or taking a quick break.
